adjective.description: (of the sky or weather) marked by a covering of gray clouds; dull.
(in sewing) edged with stitching to prevent fraying.

noun.description: Clouds covering a large part of the sky.
examples: the sky was leaden with overcast
the pebbled beach, overcast with the shadows of the high cliffs

verb.description: Stitch over (an unfinished edge) to prevent fraying.
examples: finish off the raw edge of the hem by overcasting it
